name: How To Build a Sex Room

overview: Couples looking for more spice in the bedroom hire luxury interior designer Melanie Rose to create stylish spaces where they can carry out any fantasy they wish.

episodes.overview: Melanie creates a sensual suite and helps Raj and Ryan communicate -- with blindfolds; Hannah and Wesley's basement becomes a steamy spot for shower sex.

episodes.name: Sexy Vegas Glam Suite
episodes.overview: Melanie designs a swanky dungeon to fit Lester and Soriya's polyamorous family; Meaghan and Dave seek five-star spa vibes for their intimate escape.
